data.title: Belleville General Hospital Foundation
data.meta_description: Did someone special at BGH make a difference for you or a loved one? A nurse who went above and beyond the call of duty to meet your needs A Doctor who really cared, and took the time to listen A housekeeper who never failed to brighten your day A volunteer who couldn’t do enough...
data.text:
How your ‘Hospital Hero’ gift helps

When you make a gift to the Foundation, in honour of someone who made a difference to you, you make a huge difference to them by helping to buy the equipment they need to provide even better care.

How your nomination is recognized

Your ‘Hospital Hero’ will receive a certificate and a unique lapel pin to proudly wear throughout the hospital. Their supervisors will also be notified. Your Hospital Hero will also be added to our website and published through our social media channels.

How to recognize a Hospital Hero

If your ‘Hospital Hero’ is an individual, please remember to share their first and last name if you know them and the department in which they work. Recipients are incredibly touched when they are told why they were nominated for this award – if you wish to please share this with us so that we may pass your sentiments to them. We are also happy to keep the nominations anonymous is you wish as well.
